name: Child of the Lost Woods
description:
Enter a world in chaos and assume the role of a young forest spirit who seeks to protect his home from the outside corruption. This 3D immersive adventure lets the player explore the realms of a burning forest and a story that leads into the depths of the unconscious, of regret and helplessness in the face of a polluted world. 

Controls :

  • Arrow Keys / WASD to move
  • Left Shift to run
  • 'C' to open the credits
  • Space to Start/Skip to next Dialog

Credits (by alphabetical order):

  • Arnaud Briche - Programmer, Level Design
  • Gerald Farca - Narrative Design, Game Writing 
  • Alicia Günther - Game Design, Level Design, Technical Art & Animation
  • Tobias Häussler - Sound Design, Sound Implementation, Programmer
  • André Klar - Sound Design Lead
  • Alina Werth - 2D Artist
  • Fabian Widmann - Sound Design
  • Danesh Wohlfart - Lead Programmer
